# Project: cprg306-assignments

## Overview
Next.js project for CPRG 306 weekly assignments using App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Clarify project requirements - Next.js with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Customize project for weekly assignments
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Create and run dev server task
- [x] Finalize documentation

## Project Structure
Weekly assignment folders will be added as subdirectories (e.g., week-2, week-3, etc.)

## Development

### Running the Development Server
```bash
npm run dev
```
Server runs at http://localhost:3000

### Building for Production
```bash
npm run build
npm start
```

### Stopping the Server
Press Ctrl-C in the terminal
